title: Thoughts on AI generation
content: Contentious topic. As an artist, I can see how powerful AI tools can be, but it does pose a large threat to copyright and illustrators themselves.

title: Training Models
content: Use Dreambooth, to train ontop of already existing models, or create custom LORAs in order to pinpoint specific characters or styles.

title: The AI, the VRAM, the Graphics Cards
content: Need large amounts of VRAM, use nvidia cards. 3000 series good.
